channel.title: Dungeoneering[pi] adding chest to you game need help
channel.description:
i was looking at a dungeoneering and i seen it had chest init like the idea so im gunna add some chest around mine to help people and get random items so i spawn the chest then how would i make it gimme items?
what folder should i look in? what code would i add into it?

item.title: Dungeoneering[pi] adding chest to you game need help
item.dc:creator: @Wet_Dreamss Wet Dreamss
item.description:
@Wet_Dreamss wrote:

Yeah what that guy said ^.^

So add a chest to the location you want, then click it, and it in the server run.bat you will see the object ID, go to Objecthandler.java and find that chest # and add c.addItem(1542 1, 1562 1)

etc.

Read full topic
item.source: Dungeoneering[pi] adding chest to you game need help

item.title: Dungeoneering[pi] adding chest to you game need help
item.dc:creator: @liamp liamp
item.description:
@liamp wrote:

[quote=“Anc13ntsIsBack, post:2, topic:421709”]Make it so when you click the chest do,
c.addItem(ItemID, Amt);

Most likely in the file located @ ClickObject, or ActionHandler.[/quote]
ok

Read full topic
item.source: Dungeoneering[pi] adding chest to you game need help

item.title: Dungeoneering[pi] adding chest to you game need help
item.dc:creator: @Anc13ntsIsBack Anc13ntsIsBack
item.description:
@Anc13ntsIsBack wrote:

Make it so when you click the chest do,
c.addItem(ItemID, Amt);

Most likely in the file located @ ClickObject, or ActionHandler.
